title: question about yasuo
body: {{champion:157}} so, yasuos q clearly states "this is treated as a basic attack" and applies spellblade which says"after a spellcast you next basic attack does *dmg" so curious about the item hextech revolver, has the same "basic attack does extra dmg" but yas q doesnt apply it, is that a english mistake or bug may i ask? ty

replies.body:
Hey there,

I have no idea about this interaction myself, you'll find people who have more knowledge than I over in the [Gameplay & Strategy](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy) board.
